ModMetaData.name: Ben Lubar's Vanilla Expanded Patches
ModMetaData.author: Ben Lubar
ModMetaData.description:
A collection of small patches and quality of life changes for the Vanilla Expanded series and related mods.
Patches that apply to mods that are not installed are simply not applied; there is no need to install all of Vanilla Expanded to use this mod.
XML patches (X) are always active; Harmony patches (H) can be toggled in the settings.
Vanilla Expanded Framework
- (H) Item processors (wine barrels, etc.) that only accept one type of item no longer require that item to be on the map.
Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Security
- (X) Short wall has been moved to the Security tab (from the Structure tab).
Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Farming
- (H) Crops that can never be grown in planter boxes due to fertility are no longer shown as options.
Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Production
- (X) Assembly Bench can now use the syntheline recipes added by Dubs Rimefeller.
Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Art
- (X) Rugs are now a medieval technology (rather than Industrial).
Vanilla Weapons Expanded
- (H) Pawns incapable of violence can equip "tool" weapons added by this mod. - To make pawns use fire extinguishers to extinguish fires, see https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2397915519
Vanilla Apparel Expanded
- (X) Apparel that only covers the neck (cape, scarf) is no longer considered clothing for nudity. - (X) Glasses (glasses, sunglasses) are no longer considered clothing for nudity. - (X) Hats that do not fully obscure the hair (fedora, summer hat, military beret, hard hat, baseball cap, chef's toque) are no longer considered clothing for nudity. - (X) If both this mod and Ideology are installed, the "Pants At Most" precept for nudity is allowed for tribal faction ideoligions.
Vanilla Fishing Expanded
- (X) Fishing is not a violent work type (since slaughtering animals isn't violent, fishing isn't either). - (H) Fishing zones show the number of cells they contain so you don't have to count. - (X) Tackle boxes can now be made with leather-like materials, such as synthamide from Dubs Rimefeller and cosmic weave from Science Never Stops, not just animal leather.
Vanilla Cooking Expanded
- (X) If Vanilla Plants Expanded is not installed, makes it so canned fruit can still be stored and used. - (X) Canned fish no longer counts as a non-fish meat type. - (X) The "negligible (no effect)" stages of diabetes, high cholesterol, and high blood pressure are no longer displayed on the health tab. - (X) If Android Tiers is installed, smokeleaf butter and cheese can be made from nutrient solution. - (X) Canned goods are in the "desperate only" category (like fertilized eggs and some drugs), not the "meal bad" category (like nutrient paste).
Vanilla Factions Expanded - Medieval
- (X) Low rock wall has been moved to the Security tab (from the Structure tab). - (X) Archery targets can be built by factions even if they are above the Medieval tech level. - To make antiseptic smell unable to kill pawns on its own, see https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2639653385
Vanilla Factions Expanded - Insectoids
- (X) Royal insect jelly is no longer enabled by default as an ingredient for cooking. - (H) Refugees in quests added by Royalty no longer spawn with royal jelly addictions. - (H) The bio-engineering incubator now shows a preview of the insect that will be created by the specified options. - (H) Ores mined by non-humans are no longer forbidden.
Vanilla Cooking Expanded - Sushi
- (X) Wasabi can be grown in hydroponics. The growth penalty from not having enough nearby natural water still applies.
Vanilla Brewing Expanded
- (X) Bar can now produce wort in addition to the alcohol precursor items added by this mod.
Vanilla Books Expanded
- This mod does not touch VBE. See https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2650429441 instead.
Vanilla Brewing Expanded - Coffees and Teas
- (X) If Android Tiers is installed, latte and black tea can be made from nutrient solution. - (H) Lemons that drop off of lemon trees in the home area are automatically unforbidden.
Vanilla Factions Expanded - Mechanoids
- (H) Ores mined by non-humans are no longer forbidden.
Vanilla Apparel Expanded - Accessories
- (X) Quivers can now be made from leather-like materials, such as synthamide from Dubs Rimefeller and cosmic weave from Science Never Stops, not just animal leather.
Vanilla Factions Expanded - Ancients
- (X) If Dubs Bad Hygiene is installed, ancient water purifiers work like Save Our Ship 2 life support systems.
VFME - Simple Tofu
- (H) Tofu no longer counts as meat when deciding the food type of a meal.
